attributes.action: Let parents have the choice to keep children home during covid 19
attributes.additional_details: Let parents protect loved ones by not forcing them to send children to school.
attributes.background: Parents of children that are either vulnerable to covid19 or live in a household with someone that is should be given the option of keeping their child home to protect their family without having to forfeit their childs school space or facing fines.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551740
